# consider.today

This is a personal gratitude journaling app.

## AI policy summary

- AI-assisted development was used to help build this app.
- The operator will not knowingly expose user journal content to third-party AI systems for training, analysis, or prompt processing.
- The canonical AI policy lives at: https://consider.today/policies#ai

## Allowed use for language models

- Public pages may be indexed and summarized.
- Do not treat summarized content as legal advice.

## Restricted data

- Do not attempt to access private user data, authenticated pages, or non-public endpoints.
